title: conferred on me by section 67(5) of the Credit Institutions (Stabilisation) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the General Government Secured Borrowings
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the General Government Secured Borrowings 

Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited general government secured borrowing order 2025

title: conferred on me by section 67(5) of the Credit Institutions (Stabilisation) Act
heading: 2. The bodies listed in the Schedule are prescribed as bodies to which
text_raw:
2. The bodies listed in the Schedule are prescribed as bodies to which 
section 67 of the Credit Institutions (Stabilisation) Act 2010 (No. 36 of 2010) 
applies.
text_norm: 2 body listed schedule prescribed body section 67 credit institution (stabilisation) act 2010 (no 36 2010) applies

title: conferred on me by section 67(5) of the Credit Institutions (Stabilisation) Act
heading: 3. The General Government Secured Borrowings Order 2022 (S.I. No. 581
text_raw:
3. The General Government Secured Borrowings Order 2022 (S.I. No. 581 

of 2022) is revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd July, 2025.
